name: @utilities/machine
description: Machine - yet another Finite State Automata

scripts._npm-audit:
npm audit || echo '
*** Please check warnings above ***
' && npm audit --production --audit-level high && echo '
*** npm audit reported no high-level vulnerabilities for production configuration ***
'
scripts._deps-update: echo '* Updating packages versions... '; npm-check-updates -u --upgradeAll --error-level 1 && npm install
scripts._check-changes: echo '* Checking if git directory is clean... '; bash -c '[[ -z $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]'
scripts.update-deps: npm run _check-changes && npm run _deps-update && npm test && git commit -am 'updated deps'
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run inspect && npm run _npm-audit && npm run _deps-check
scripts.commit-and-push: npm run _commit && npm test && npm run _push
scripts._patch-release: npm version patch && git commit -am 'npm version patch' && npm run _publish
scripts._minor-release: npm version minor && git commit -am 'npm version minor' && npm run _publish
scripts._major-release: npm version major && git commit -am 'npm version major' && npm run _publish
scripts.patch-release: npm test && npm run _patch-release && npm run _push
scripts.minor-release: npm test && npm run _minor-release && npm run _push
scripts.__major-release: npm test && npm run _major-release && npm run _push
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:typescript
